titles.title: A bill to amend section 97 of title 28, United States Code, to provide for Federal district court to be held in Hopkinsville, Kentucky.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 2/19/1987--Introduced. Provides that the U.S. District Court for the Western District of Kentucky shall be held in Hopkinsville, Kentucky, in addition to those places currently provided by law.
